column1: '''The Tolkien Park''' is a project proposed by [[The Tolkien Society]] to create a park and center in honor of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The process requires a large amount of funding and because of this has yet to take off.
* [http://tolkiensociety.org/t_park/tolkienpark.html The Tolkien Park] - More information at the Tolkien Society website
